attributes.action: Cut the salaries Pensions and Travel Perks of Members of Parliment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's have lost the will to oppose any policy that may affect their future income. The more we pay the less democracy we receive. Madness in this day and age when we need more intense checking of the executive and its powers. Our representatives have been paid off, Lets see them vote by their conscience and not by their bank account statement. Frightened by deslection from the gratuitous gravy train of Westminister. Please give us back Mp's with the Political courage that we sent them to Westminister with
